Shortcuts

torchcell

class torchcell.datasets.CellDataset(root: str = 'data/scerevisiae/cell', genome: Genome = None, seq_embeddings: BaseEmbeddingDataset | None = None, experiments: list[torch_geometric.data.in_memory_dataset.InMemoryDataset] | InMemoryDataset = None, transform: Callable | None = None, pre_transform: Callable | None = None, pre_filter: Callable | None = None)

Represents a dataset for cellular data.

create_seq_graph(seq_embeddings: BaseEmbeddingDataset) → Data

Create a graph from seq_embeddings.

get(idx: int) → Data

Gets the data object at index idx.

process()

Processes the dataset to the self.processed_dir folder.

property processed_file_names: list[str]

The name of the files in the self.processed_dir folder that must be present in order to skip processing.

class torchcell.datasets.FungalUtrTransformerDataset(root: str, genome: SCerevisiaeGenome, transformer_model_name: str | None = None, transform: Callable | None = None, pre_transform: Callable | None = None)
initialize_transformer()

Initialize the transformer using the valid model name.

process()

Processes the dataset to the self.processed_dir folder.

class torchcell.datasets.NucleotideTransformerDataset(root: str, genome: SCerevisiaeGenome, transformer_model_name: str | None = None, transform: Callable | None = None, pre_transform: Callable | None = None)
process()

Processes the dataset to the self.processed_dir folder.
